Use baking soda and water to create a homemade soap substitute. Mix equal parts baking soda and water to create a paste, and use it as a body wash.
Use sand and water to create a scrubbing paste. Sand has natural abrasive properties that can help remove dirt and grime.
Use a toothbrush and toothpaste to clean your teeth and gums.
Use a cloth and a bucket of warm water to wash your clothes and linens.
Use a brush and a bucket of water to clean your floors and surfaces.
